mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select a.payment payment, a.adnum adnum, b.b_id b_id, b.name name, to_char(a.startdate, 'MM/DD') startdate, to_char(a.enddate, 'MM/DD') enddate, a.photo photo, a.link link, a.price price, a.grade grade from ad a join business b on a.b_id=b.b_id order by startdate desc ) where rownum<=#{param1} order by adnum asc ) where rownum<=#{param2} order by adnum desc
select count(b_id) newAd from ad where grade='검토중'
select count(b_id) ingAd from ad where b_id=#{param1} and grade='승인' and to_char(startdate,'YY/MM/DD') <= to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') and to_char(enddate,'YY/MM/DD') >= to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD')
select count(b_id) yetAd from ad where b_id=#{param1} and grade='검토중'
select count(b_id) edAd from ad where b_id=#{param1} and grade='승인' and to_char(enddate,'YY/MM/DD') < to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD')
select count(b_id) yetAd from ad where b_id=#{param1} and payment='미결제' and grade='승인'
select adnum, a.b_id b_id, startdate, enddate, photo, info, link, price, grade, payment, name, num, tel, addr from ad a join business b on a.b_id = b.b_id and adnum = #{param1}
